original_title: Namal Rajapaksa’s office issues letter to CEB Chairman
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Parliamentarian Namal Rajapaksa's office has issued a letter regarding the information presented by the Ceylon Electricity Board regarding the non-payment of electricity bills.
The letter has been issued by Parliamentarian Namal Rajapaksa's coordinating secretary to the Chairman of the Ceylon Electricity Board.
The letter asks whether an electricity bill has been issued by the Ceylon Electricity Board, as per the letter currently being circulated on social media.

Namal Rajapaksa's coordinating secretary has requested in the relevant letter that if such a bill has been submitted, to state under whose name and on which date it has been forwarded, to which address, and to provide the correct information on the relevant bill.
